docs.text: edgex-global-pipelines This repository contains useful Jenkins global library functions used within the EdgeX Jenkins build pipeline here: https://jenkins.edgexfoundry.org . You can learm more about Jenkins global libraries here: https://jenkins.io/doc/book/pipeline/shared-libraries/ Jenkins Shared Libraries Please note documentation is still a work in progress edgeXBuildCApp edgeXBuildDocker edgeXBuildGoApp
docs.title: edgex-global-pipelines

docs.text: This repository contains useful Jenkins global library functions used within the EdgeX Jenkins build pipeline here: https://jenkins.edgexfoundry.org . You can learm more about Jenkins global libraries here: https://jenkins.io/doc/book/pipeline/shared-libraries/
docs.title: edgex-global-pipelines
Please note documentation is still a work in progress

docs.text: edgeXBuildCApp Shared Library to build C projects Parameters project - Specify your project name dockerBuildFilePath - Specify your Docker Build file Path dockerFilePath - Specify your Dockerfile path pushImage - Set this false if you dont want to push the image to DockerHub, by default true Example Usage edgeXBuildCApp ( project: 'device-bacnet-c' , dockerBuildFilePath: 'scripts/Dockerfile.alpine-3.9-base' , dockerFilePath: 'scripts/Dockerfile.alpine-3.9' ) edgeXBuildCApp ( project: 'device-sdk-c' , dockerBuildFilePath: 'scripts/Dockerfile.alpine-3.11-base' , dockerFilePath: 'scripts/Dockerfile.alpine-3.11' , pushImage: false )
docs.title: edgeXBuildCApp

docs.text: Shared Library to build C projects
docs.title: edgeXBuildCApp

docs.text: project - Specify your project name dockerBuildFilePath - Specify your Docker Build file Path dockerFilePath - Specify your Dockerfile path pushImage - Set this false if you dont want to push the image to DockerHub, by default true
docs.title: Parameters

docs.text: edgeXBuildCApp ( project: 'device-bacnet-c' , dockerBuildFilePath: 'scripts/Dockerfile.alpine-3.9-base' , dockerFilePath: 'scripts/Dockerfile.alpine-3.9' ) edgeXBuildCApp ( project: 'device-sdk-c' , dockerBuildFilePath: 'scripts/Dockerfile.alpine-3.11-base' , dockerFilePath: 'scripts/Dockerfile.alpine-3.11' , pushImage: false )
docs.title: Example Usage

docs.text: edgeXBuildDocker Shared Library to build docker images Parameters project - Specify your project name dockerImageName - Specify your Docker Image name semver - Set this true for Semantic versioning dockerNexusRepo - Specify Docker Nexus repository Example Usage edgeXBuildDocker ( project: 'docker-edgex-consul' , dockerImageName: 'docker-edgex-consul' , semver: true ) edgeXBuildDocker ( project: 'edgex-taf-common' , mavenSettings: 'taf-settings' , dockerNexusRepo: 'snapshots' , semver: true )
docs.title: edgeXBuildDocker

docs.text: Shared Library to build docker images
docs.title: edgeXBuildDocker

docs.text: project - Specify your project name dockerImageName - Specify your Docker Image name semver - Set this true for Semantic versioning dockerNexusRepo - Specify Docker Nexus repository
docs.title: Parameters

docs.text: edgeXBuildDocker ( project: 'docker-edgex-consul' , dockerImageName: 'docker-edgex-consul' , semver: true ) edgeXBuildDocker ( project: 'edgex-taf-common' , mavenSettings: 'taf-settings' , dockerNexusRepo: 'snapshots' , semver: true )
docs.title: Example Usage

docs.text: edgeXBuildGoApp Shared Library to build Go projects Parameters project - Specify your project name goVersion - Go version Example Usage edgeXBuildGoApp ( project: 'device-random-go' , goVersion: '1.13' ) edgeXBuildGoApp ( project: 'app-functions-sdk-go' , semver: true, goVersion: '1.13' , testScript: 'make test' , buildImage: false, publishSwaggerDocs: true, swaggerApiFolders: [ 'openapi/v2' ] )
docs.title: edgeXBuildGoApp

docs.text: Shared Library to build Go projects
docs.title: edgeXBuildGoApp

docs.text: project - Specify your project name goVersion - Go version
docs.title: Parameters

docs.text: edgeXBuildGoApp ( project: 'device-random-go' , goVersion: '1.13' ) edgeXBuildGoApp ( project: 'app-functions-sdk-go' , semver: true, goVersion: '1.13' , testScript: 'make test' , buildImage: false, publishSwaggerDocs: true, swaggerApiFolders: [ 'openapi/v2' ] )
